Azure took a more casual tone and relaxed, knowing he had things under
control.

Azure: Better. Please lead me to your Lady...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> NPC:
> 
> All the troops looked to the boss and with a motion of his hand, all
the bots lowered his weapons.
> 
> "will you follow usm, sir?"said more polite the bot
>
